summary: This document appears to be a daily assignment log or staff schedule for an individual named 'Noel, T' at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, NY, covering dates in July and August 2019. It records assignments to specific units (like SHU - Special Housing Unit), leave status, and work hours, providing a timeline of staff activity at the facility during the period Jeffrey Epstein was incarcerated there.

locations: MCC New York, New York, NY
keyFacts: This is a staff assignment log for an employee at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York during July-August 2019.
The document shows assignments to Special Housing Units (SHU #1, SHU #2, SHU #3), which is where high-profile inmates like Jeffrey Epstein were typically held.
The timing (Q3 2019) corresponds with Jeffrey Epstein's incarceration at MCC New York prior to his death on August 10, 2019.
The log records various duty statuses including regular shifts, overtime (OT), sick leave, and days off for the staff member.
This type of document could be relevant for establishing staff presence and assignments during Epstein's time in custody.
